storyInfo: After the first rays of dawn, the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub will make their own choices, and of course, others will do the same. But as for which choices are correct– whether now, or in the future– it's all up in the air.

attributes.content: Ugh, so do we all have to go to that Rhodes Island place for treatment?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You don't 'have' to go, you 'get' to go. Just because you're used to living with Oripathy doesn't make it less dangerous!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No matter how many things we still have to do, if our bodies fall apart first, what good are all those ideas?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Well, you have a point.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I sure do. Take care of yourselves. It's been a while since we've gotten any serious Oripathy treatment.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We knights aren't the only ones affected either. There are still so many ordinary workers, farmers, and civilians with us... and we can't force them to suffer through Oripathy.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We can't let what happened to Jamie happen to anyone else.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Oh, Ashley, what's up?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We talked to that Sarkaz medic, Hibiscus. Rhodes Island has to leave the Grand Knight Territory this afternoon.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We have a lot of people with us, so we need to get ready asap.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Alright. Justyna and Iwona should be reaching out to the rest of the Infected who can still be contacted.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The Armorless Union and General Chamber of Commerce really plan on giving up, huh?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: If what we learned is true, they should be a bit tied up right now with their own problems.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And besides, Rhodes Island is still under the protection of the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi. At least for now... they're safe.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hm? What'cha staring at me for?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What did Toland say to you?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Huh? Where did that come from all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ever since the two of you went to that village outside the Grand Knight Territory, you're like a completely different person.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Those villages on the outskirts of the Grand Knight Territory were established over the last few years in conjunction with the Kawalerielki Alliance. There shouldn't be anyone out there except a bunch of ordinary farmers.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I doubt the bounty hunters have a foothold out there, so he must've had some other purpose.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: He entrusted us with a single task.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Concerning Kazimierz, this country, the Infected, and all of us.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Why didn't you tell me then?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ahaha... Honestly, I'm not sure why myself. It's been on my mind this whole time. Thought I'd tell everybody about it once I sorted things through in my own head...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: A-Are you mad at me?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Then just come out with it.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Isn't that what you once said to me?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Haha. You don't even know how fidgety Greynuty has been the last few days. I kept having to tell her everything is fine.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Pshh. No one here asks you to carry everything on your own, Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So, what's eating you up?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: If what we are going to do next is at odds with the purpose we had when establishing Pinus Sylvestris... What would you do then?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What does that mean?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: If we're no longer just fighting against the corrupt knights, against the K.G.C.C., no longer solely fighting for the benefit of the Infected––
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If we have to tolerate the discrimination against the Infected, join hands with former enemies, choose our fights carefully... If we have to completely change ourselves––
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ––If we had to indefinitely set aside the peaceful lives just in front of our eyes, and leap into the fire again... What would you do?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ugh, what's with all these questions out of the blue? I'm not good with the philosophical stuff. What's the difference?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: How would you answer your own questions?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: As an Infected, as a knight, I believe... that we should strive to do more. Although right now... I don't know.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But as 'Sona,' this isn't how I want to leave you all... Still, I'd rather that than force you down a path you never intended to take.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And beyond that, nobody even knows where this path will lead.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Um.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I've seen you lost in thought a whole bunch recently, and it's made all of us uneasy. But I hope... I hope you understand one thing.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris may be the name of a knightclub, but we all know that even if we're knights, we also aren't really knights.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Whether you're coming to us as a knight, as an Infected, as a Zalak, or even as just regular old Sona, you can always talk to us.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ashley...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And, you'll get the same answer every time.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We're not splitting up.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: To be honest, after everything we've been through, I don't think there are any Infected in the knightclub who strictly identify as knights.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Of course, those who want to leave and pursue an ordinary lifestyle, we'll help them as well...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: But that lifestyle isn't for us. Not the four of us.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: That's right! If we were as mercenary as those guys, I would've waited all these years for nothing!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What are you waiting for?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: For a storm! So I can become the lightning!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If you like lightning that much, you should just paint your armor gold.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Woah... Great idea!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Now that you've all made your feelings clear, let's focus on the issue in front of us!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Let's get the Infected over to Rhodes Island! No rest till everyone's on board!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We're going... to set sail soon.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Flametail! Not everyone made it for the roll call! They must've been captured by patrolling knights!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Huh? Didn't they make everyone legal? Why are the knights still arresting people?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I-I don't know... Th-They said they're not releasing anyone without a ransom!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Grrr... Corrupt nobles in need of some discipline... Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I know. Tell the others to keep to the plan and report to Rhodes Island. We need to act fast.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: A-Alright. What about you?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: We're gonna do what we've always done.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Uhh... Hmm...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, all these people...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I knew what was coming, but actually seeing this many at once... makes me wonder if we actually have the capacity.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It'll be fine. Doctor got some help from Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh right, Amiya, I heard we were planning to open a new office in the Grand Knight Territory?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ah... Yes. With how many Infected knights there are, we can't keep them all on Rhodes Island forever... Plus, there are still those Infected who we can't take care of, who still need a way out.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When the time is right, Pinus Sylvestris will help us establish a office.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How nice. They'll even get to see their homes again.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Was this that Flametail Knight's idea?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Not entirely. The Doctor also pitched in.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Aww, I really wanted to meet Flametail Knight. I heard she's done so many amazing things. Amiya, do you know why she isn't here yet?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Huh, now that you mention it... She was supposed to be here by now...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, Hibiscus, it's time to go.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Oh, okay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Shining, have you seen those knights from Pinus Sylvestris?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: From what the Infected knights told me, they stayed behind to help some Infected who were being harassed by knight-nobles, and were unable to catch up with the rest of the team.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Then, we need to go back them up––
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Until we leave this country's borders, Kazimierz will continue to keep a close eye on us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even now, dozens of campaign knights are waiting for our 'foreign enterprise' to leave the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Sorry... I let my emotions get the better of me, and I got into a fight with that knight-noble.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Don't worry about that now. Even if you hadn't overreacted, they would've found some excuse to torment you. Just grit your teeth and run!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona, we've got company. Not the knight-nobles. It's the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: They're tailing us from both sides, up on the roofs.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Aha, perfect. I was just about to feel guilty for not leaving them a parting gift!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That makes two of us!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No, we have to keep moving and get to Rhodes Island as soon as we can. We mustn't cause trouble for them.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A pillar of light?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That must be Nearl, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes... No doubt about it.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: None... at all.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahh!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: L-Look at that red-tailed Zalak running towards us! Is that the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Huh? Isn't the boarding ramp on this side though?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry I'm late, Miss Amiya–––
attributes.name: A Distant Voice

attributes.content: Gangway! We're jumpin––!!
attributes.name: A Distant Voice

attributes.content: Wait, what? Are they actually going to––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: W-We're actually doing thiiiiis?! Woooah, that felt like a real heroes' entrance, right out of a novel.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Haha, piece of cake!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I wouldn't have brought my shield with me if I knew this was going to happen... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sorry for dropping in unannounced.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ah, it's fine...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Long time no see, little knight.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: *huff* *huff* Heh, it wasn't that long ago.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In the flesh! How've you been, Amiya? Should we get everyone introduced?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Good morning, Mr. Czarny. Why the formalwear today? Are you finally heading back to the city?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: A very distinguished guest will be paying me a visit today. I've waited a long, long time for him.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Oh... What kind of guest? Is he also from the city?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: He's... a former colleague.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: I see, I see. I won't bother you anymore then. Just make sure to fetch the water before the sun goes down.
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: I'm also very curious what he's like now.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: The last time we met... He was still a helpless little pen-pusher. So wishy-washy that he couldn't even speak up for himself. Didn't even have a single decent suit.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: But now...
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: You've changed so much, Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: I know you must have a lot of questions.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: What, are you surprised that my house is so run-down?
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: The thing that surprises me more is how well you seem to have adapted to this life.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Haha... I'm sure that one day, the number of people in high positions solely because of their birth will become fewer and fewer.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Just look at your tone of voice now, Malkiewicz. You're more qualified for your job than I ever could've imagined. Congratulations.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Before I found work in the Grand Knight Territory, I was just the son of a winery worker.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: That's quite different from what was on the resume you left in the office.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh... You even did your homework on me. See, Malkiewicz? I have a good eye for talent.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: You are in peril, and you are powerless within the K.G.C.C., but you still managed to track me down and find my home, even after I completely changed my identity... You found me, Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: 'I can hardly recognize you anymore.'
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: If you're going to be uncomfortable, at least try not to show it. It's bad for negotiations.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: I am a branded criminal, and you... Well, the fact that you've come before me today without a completely new face means that you've risen through the ranks since the end of the Major.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Come, let us toast to your promotion.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny, your exile was unjust.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh. You didn't come here just to tell me that.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: The fact that you know the truth, about how I was treated... means that the people who told you this truth wanted something from you.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: If I was in their position, I surely would've wanted 'Czarny' dead.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: I'm not doing that.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: That goes against my principles.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Principles, hm? Do you not realize, the person standing before me, speaking so confidently of 'principles' was a pauper who couldn't even put food on the table just a few months ago.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Face it, Malkiewicz. You've already embraced this society. Sooner or later, you'll join its chosen.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Mmm... Quite a nice aroma to these two cups of wine.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: But I... don't think you should have to lose your life...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Platinum of the Armorless Union was just as naive and innocent as you, which is why I have my life. Of course, I think she only spared me out of convenience.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: My family chose not to accompany me to this little village, instead continuing their comfortable lives in the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: They divided up my assets, the Radiant Knight became the champion, and Czarny became a criminal. The Infected can never break the shackles of public perception–
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: ––It proves I never misjudged Kazimierz. It is what it is.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Come, Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: This bottle of brandy was given to me by a former employee who I had promoted. He secretly sent someone to deliver this to me after learning that I was still alive.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Despite that, though, he still looted my ill-gotten 'bribes.' I had to pretend not to see that the necklace he was wearing came from my collection.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: And this glass... is poisoned. But don't worry, I only just slipped in the drug. As long as you don't drink it, nothing bad will happen.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: ––What's the meaning of this?!
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Help yourself to a glass. I'll take the other one.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: No! This is ridiculous–– I'll be taking my leave!
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Of course you can leave, Malkiewicz, but the end result will be the same. Oh, and don't try to throw out the wine either. Wine is very precious, but poison is plentiful.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Why... Why are you forcing me to do this? I don't understand! We only just met by chance during the Major––
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Malkiewicz, have you really not figured it out yet?
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Cheers, Malkiewicz. To your continued ascendance, and to... my retirement.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Cheers!
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: Hm? Are you Mr. Czarny's guest? Why are you here alone? What happened to him?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: What does Mr. Czarny... usually do around here?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Haha, that's a story to be shared over dinner! The folks from the city sure know their stuff. Most of the time he's helping the other villagers plan their business, or teaching the kids how to read and write...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: What's wrong? Your face is all red... D-Did I say something to offend you?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: No, it's nothing.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh... Are you headed back then? S-Sorry to bother you.
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: I won't give in.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I won't become what you said, Mr. Czarny. I'll fight to the bitter end.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I swear it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz
